notes: proper noun; usually used without article
example_sentence_english: I am going to Venice tomorrow.

notes: unusual for a proper noun; used poetically or to mean 'a Venice-like place'
example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato una venezia in miniatura.

notes: article sometimes used for emphasis or poetic contexts; usually omitted
plural rarely used; mostly poetic or historical
example_sentence_italian: In alcune mappe antiche appaiono le venezie.
example_sentence_english: On some old maps the Venices appear.

notes: rare plural; cities are normally singular
example_sentence_italian: Le venezie descritte nei testi sono diverse.
example_sentence_english: The Venices described in the texts are different.

notes: partitive plural form; rare usage for a proper noun
example_sentence_italian: Ho letto di delle venezie storiche.
example_sentence_english: I read about some historic Venices.

notes: contraction of di + la; cities usually used without article
example_sentence_italian: Parlo del nome della venezia antica.
example_sentence_english: I talk about the name of the ancient Venice.

notes: contraction of a + la; typically Italians say 'a Venezia' without article
example_sentence_italian: Siamo andati alla venezia dei miei sogni.
example_sentence_english: We went to the Venice of my dreams.

notes: contraction of da + la; usually 'da Venezia' without article
example_sentence_english: I returned from the historic Venice.

notes: contraction of in + la; often 'in Venezia' without article
example_sentence_italian: Ho perso il passaporto nella venezia antica.
example_sentence_english: I lost my passport in the ancient Venice.

notes: contraction of su + la; commonly 'su Venezia' or 'a proposito di Venezia' instead
example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una storia sulla venezia.
example_sentence_english: I read a story about Venice.

notes: con + la is not contracted; still used in specific constructions
example_sentence_italian: Ho un legame con la venezia del passato.
example_sentence_english: I have a connection with the Venice of the past.
